DataTypes.name: Finance
DataTypes.description: Financial information, such as credit/debit card data, other payment information, credit scores, etc.

DataTypes.name: Health
DataTypes.description: Health Information, such as information about health conditions, prescriptions, medication, as well as health monitoring data, e.g., heart rate, step count, activity level, etc.

DataTypes.name: Demographic
DataTypes.description: Demographic Information, e.g., gender, age, occupation, education, etc.

DataTypes.name: Contact
DataTypes.description: Contact Information, such as name, email address, phone number, street address, etc.

DataTypes.name: Location
DataTypes.description: Geo-location information (e.g., user's current location) regardless of granularity, i.e., could be exact location, ZIP code, city-level.
items: GSM, UMTS, and GPS location data

DataTypes.name: Personal identity identifier
DataTypes.description: dentifiers that uniquely identify a person,e.g., SSN, driver's license number, etc.

DataTypes.name: Online identifier
DataTypes.description: Permanent (e.g., device IDs, MAC address) or temporary (e.g., IP address) identifiers needed to establish a connection for the current browsing session. Identifiers locally stored on user's device by the company/organization or third-parties including cookies, beacons, or similar that are commonly used to uniquely identify users, but that are not essential to establish a connection with the user’s device or to provide a service.
items: Log in data to online services

DataTypes.name: Device information
DataTypes.description: Technical information about devices (including PC, mobile phones, etc.) used

DataTypes.name: Biometric information
DataTypes.description: Unique, measurable biological characteristics and traits of a person that can be used for identification and authentication purposes

DataTypes.name: User online activities
DataTypes.description: The user's online activities on the first party website/app or other websites/apps, e.g., pages visited, time spent on pages, general user behavior online, etc.

DataTypes.name: User profile
DataTypes.description: The user’s profile on the first-party website/app and its contents, e.g., data in user profile, data that user uploaded to website, user comments, user profile preferences, etc. This is common for websites/apps where users can create an account or profile, e.g., on twitter, youtube, Facebook, Amazon, etc.

DataTypes.name: Social media data
DataTypes.description: User profile and data from a social media website/app or other third party service to which the user gave the first party access, e.g., by connecting with Facebook, twitter, or other services. Exchanged data may include user profile, photos, comments, friends, etc.
items: Contacts (Followers, Followees, Friends, Their gender etc)

DataTypes.name: Criminal records/Court judgements
DataTypes.description: Criminal records detail an individual's interactions with the criminal justice system, encompassing arrests, charges, indictments, convictions, and sentences, while court judgments represent formal legal decisions by courts, specifying findings, rulings, and outcomes of legal proceedings.
items: Closed court sittings in civil matters
Criminal records of convictions and offences

DataTypes.name: Survey data
DataTypes.description: Any data that is collected through surveys

DataTypes.name: Generic personal information
DataTypes.description: No specific type of information is mentioned, but the policy talks about 'personal information' or 'personal identifiable information' in general.

DataTypes.name: Other
DataTypes.description: A specific type of information not covered by the above categories.

DataTypes.name: Unspecified
DataTypes.description: The type of information is not explicitly stated or unclear (e.g., refers to 'information' very generically).
